sentences.en: Asked if he was a candidate, he refused to commit himself.
sentences.cn: 当问到他是不是候选人时, 他不置可否.

sentences.en: Don't commit yourself. It'll let us in for trouble.
sentences.cn: 别随便表态, 这会使我们陷入麻烦的.

sentences.en: He [ She ] is not allowed to commit any outrages.
He brooded on whether she should commIt'suicide.
sentences.cn: 他想她是不是死于自杀.

sentences.en: He couldn't commit himself on any issue.
sentences.cn: 他不愿在任何问题上表态.

sentences.en: He has clearly committed his government to continuing down the path of economic reform.
sentences.cn: 他明确地作出保证，他的政府会继续在经济改革的道路上走下去。

sentences.en: I'll repeat that so you can commit it to memory.
sentences.cn: 我会重复一下，好让你们记住。

sentences.en: It makes me sick that people commit offences and never get punished.
sentences.cn: 一些人屡屡犯罪却从未受到惩戒，这真让我气愤。

sentences.en: Nobody was prepared to commit themselves.
Seven men, all from Bristol, admitted conspiracy to commit arson.
sentences.cn: 7个人都来自布里斯托尔，他们承认了合谋纵火。

sentences.en: She didn't want to commit herself one way or the other.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样，她都不想明确表态。

sentences.en: They are sitting on the fence and refusing to commit themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们保持中立，拒绝表态。

sentences.en: Will the President be able to hold to this commit-ment?
Women commit fewer crimes than men.

words.tran_cn: 坚定的；效忠的；承担义务的
委员会；佣金；犯；委任；委任状
理事；委员；行政长官；总裁
承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身
委托；承担义务；赞助；收监；献身（等于commitment）
承诺；委托；干坏事；付诸（commit的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 犯罪，承诺，忠于(某人)，明确表态，自杀，调配，把…正式送进(医院、监狱等)，把…写下来/记住
trans.tran_en: to do something wrong or illegal

trans.tran_cn: 犯， 干； 把…托付给； 提交； 使承担义务， 使承诺； 把…置于； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
trans.tran_en: to do something wrong or illegal
